thread.title: Colts' fake punt among NFL's dumbest plays
thread.title_full: Colts' fake punt among NFL's dumbest plays

title: Colts' fake punt among NFL's dumbest plays
text: > Sports Colts' fake punt among NFL's dumbest plays FILE - In this Jan. 14, 1973, file photo, Washington Redskins' Mike Bass (41) runs toward the end zone as Miami Dolphins kicker Gary Pepremian pursues in the fourth quarter of the Super Bowl in Los Angeles. Yepremian had a kick blocked, the ball bounced back to him and he tried to pass but it was deflected to Bass who ran it in for a touchdown. At right is Redskins' Ted Vactor. (AP Photo/File)
